'''Fairest of Scenes''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of Fairest of Scenes is obtained from the [[Springtime Charms/Festive Travel Journal|Festive Travel Journal]] subevent during [[Springtime Charms]].
